channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [SKYGOLD] Sky Gold And Diamonds Ltd Approves Q3 and Nine Months Financial Results for 2025
item.description:
Sky Gold And Diamonds Ltd has approved the Standalone and Consolidated Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The results were reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors in their respective meetings. The company has also changed its method of charging depreciation for property, plant and equipment from Written Down Value (WDV) to Straight Line Method (SLM) starting from April 1, 2025.

  • Sky Gold And Diamonds Ltd has approved the Standalone and Consolidated Unaudited Financial Results for Q3 and nine months ended December 31, 2025.
  • The results were reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors.
  • The company has changed its method of charging depreciation for property, plant and equipment from Written Down Value (WDV) to Straight Line Method (SLM) starting from April 1, 2025.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Sky Gold Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [IGL] Indraprastha Gas Ltd. to Declare Interim Dividend for FY 2025-26
item.description:
Indraprastha Gas Ltd. has informed the BSE that their Board of Directors will meet on February 12, 2026, to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended December 31, 2025. Additionally, the Board will discuss the declaration of an interim dividend on the equity shares of the Company for the Financial Year 2025-26. The trading window of the Company is closed from January 01, 2026, till the expiry of 48 hours after the Unaudited Financial Results are made public on February 12, 2026.

  • Indraprastha Gas Ltd. Board Meeting scheduled on February 12, 2026
  • Consideration and approval of Unaudited Financial Results for Q4 2025
  • Possible declaration of interim dividend for FY 2025-26
  • Trading window closed from January 01, 2026, till 48 hours after results are made public

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: INDRAPRASTHA GAS LTD. | Category: Dividend

item.title: [JDCABLES] JD Cables Ltd. Announces Board Meeting Approval for Expansion of Business Activity and EGM Notice
item.description:
JD Cables Ltd. held a board meeting on 9th February 2026, where they approved the draft Monitoring Agency report dated 28th January 2026 by CRISIL Ratings Limited. The company also decided to expand its business activities and inserted new main objects into the existing main objects of the company in Clause III (A) of MOA. The Board has approved the Notice of EGM, which will be held on Friday, 6th March 2026. Mr. Sachin Pilania, Practicing Company Secretary, has been appointed as the Scrutinizer for the EGM.

  • Approval of draft Monitoring Agency report dated 28th January 2026 by CRISIL Ratings Limited
  • Expansion of business activity in addition to the existing business
  • New main objects inserted into the existing main objects of the company in CLAUSE III (A) of MOA
  • EGM of the members of the Company will be held on Friday, 6th March 2026
  • Appointment of Mr. Sachin Pilania as the Scrutinizer for the EGM

Company: JD Cables Ltd | Category: Business Update

item.title: [UNITECH] Unitech Ltd Schedules Board Meeting to Approve Q3 and Nine Months Financial Results for 2025
item.description:
Unitech Ltd, a company listed on the BSE, has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on 12th February 2026 to consider and approve the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025. This is in accordance with the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

  • Unitech Ltd scheduled a Board Meeting for 12th February 2026
  • The meeting aims to consider and approve the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025

item.title: [BHATEXT] Bharat Textiles & Proofing Industries Ltd to Approve Q4 Results and Secretarial Auditor for FY 2025-26
item.description:
Bharat Textiles & Proofing Industries Ltd has scheduled a Board of Directors meeting on 12th February 2026. The agenda includes the approval of unaudited financial results for the quarter ended 31st December 2025, limited review report for the same quarter, and the appointment of Jain Sonesh& Associates as the secretarial auditor for the financial year 2025-26. Any other matter with the permission of the Chair will also be considered.

  • Bharat Textiles & Proofing Industries Ltd to approve unaudited Q4 results for 2025
  • Limited review report for Q4 2025 to be approved
  • Jain Sonesh& Associates appointed as secretarial auditor for FY 2025-26

Company: BHARAT TEXTILES & PROOFING INDUSTRIES LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [MCCHRLS-B] Mac Charles India Ltd to Approve Q3 FY2025-26 Financial Results on Feb 12, 2026
item.description:
Mac Charles India Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on February 12, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter ended 31st December 2025. The meeting will be held at the company's registered office in Bangalore, and the audited financial statements will be reviewed by the company's auditors.

  • Mac Charles India Ltd to hold a Board meeting on Feb 12, 2026
  • The meeting will consider and approve Q3 FY2025-26 financial results
  • The results will be unaudited and include both standalone and consolidated statements
  • The meeting will take place at the company's registered office in Bangalore
  • The audited financial statements will be reviewed by the company's auditors

item.title: [SYNTHFO] Synthiko Foils Ltd to Approve Unaudited Financial Results for Q3 & 9M 2025 in February 2026 Board Meeting
item.description:
Synthiko Foils Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on February 12, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. This is in accordance with Regulation 29 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

  • Synthiko Foils Ltd to hold a Board Meeting on February 12, 2026
  • The meeting will consider and approve the unaudited financial results for Q3 and 9M 2025
  • The results are for the period ended December 31, 2025
  • This announcement is in compliance with Regulation 29 of the SEBI Listing Regulations, 2015

item.title: [AKSPINTEX] Sunrakshakk Industries India Ltd Invites to Q3 & 9M FY26 Investor/Analyst Conference Call
item.description:
Sunrakshakk Industries India Ltd has announced an Investor/Analyst conference call for Q3 & 9M FY26. The conference will be conducted on 16th February 2026 at 03:00 PM (IST). The company has provided access numbers for participants from USA, UK, Singapore, and Hong Kong. The primary log in is through a Diamond Pass. The key participants from the company side are Mr. Saurabh Chhabra, Promotor & Director, and Mr. Sandeep Hinger, Finance Head, FMCG Division.

  • Sunrakshakk Industries India Ltd has scheduled an Investor/Analyst conference call for Q3 & 9M FY26.
  • The conference call will be held on 16th February 2026 at 03:00 PM (IST).
  • The company has provided access numbers for participants from USA, UK, Singapore, and Hong Kong.
  • Mr. Saurabh Chhabra, Promotor & Director, and Mr. Sandeep Hinger, Finance Head, FMCG Division, will be the key participants from the company side.

Company: A.K. Spintex Ltd | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [MANINDS] Man Industries (India) Ltd Approves Q3 FY2025-26 Unaudited Financial Results
item.description:
Man Industries (India) Ltd has approved the unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The standalone financial results reflect revenue of Rs. 80,354 lakhs and Rs. 2,29,828 lakhs, and net profit of Rs. 8,173 lakhs and Rs. 12,864 lakhs for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025, respectively. The consolidated financial results of the company and its subsidiaries reflect total revenue of Rs. 1,20,329 lakhs and Rs. 3,41,602 lakhs, and net profit of Rs. 10,051 lakhs and Rs. 20,774 lakhs for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025, respectively. The financial results are prepared in accordance with the Ind AS notified under the Companies (Indian Accounting Standard) Rules, 2015.

  • Man Industries (India) Ltd has reported a net profit of Rs. 8,173 lakhs and Rs. 12,864 lakhs for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025, respectively.
  • The standalone financial results reflect revenue of Rs. 80,354 lakhs and Rs. 2,29,828 lakhs for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025, respectively.
  • The consolidated financial results of the company and its subsidiaries reflect total revenue of Rs. 1,20,329 lakhs and Rs. 3,41,602 lakhs, and net profit of Rs. 10,051 lakhs and Rs. 20,774 lakhs for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025, respectively.
  • The financial results are prepared in accordance with the Ind AS notified under the Companies (Indian Accounting Standard) Rules, 2015.
  • The outstanding order book position as on date is approx. Rs. 4,005 crores to be executed in 6 to 12 months.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: MAN INDUSTRIES (INDIA) LTD.-$ | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [IRBINVIT] IRB InvIT Fund to Announce Q3 & 9M FY2026 Results on February 11, 2026
item.description:
IRB InvIT Fund will announce results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025, on February 11, 2026. These results will be available on the Trust website, www. irbinvit.co.in. The Trust will conduct an earnings call at 11.00 am IST on February 12, 2026, where senior management of the Investment Manager will discuss the Trustâ€™s performance and answer questions from participants. A transcript of this conference call will also be available on the website subsequently.
